to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full

sentences.english: He had never dreamed that the fund of human knowledge bulked so big.
sentences.chinese: 他從沒想到人類知識的積蓄竟會如此汗牛充棟。

sentences.english: There are tons of studies about Song Xue before, with different views.
sentences.chinese: 以往的宋學研究成果，汗牛充棟，討論角度各有不同。

sentences.english: Astronomy and geography anything, Expo Group, a voluminous.
sentences.chinese: 天文地理無所不看，博覽羣書，汗牛充棟。

sentences.english: The long and winding history of art brought along numerous - isms .
sentences.chinese: 藝術史的延綿更替造就了太多汗牛充棟的主義。

sentences.english: All previous dynasties scholar to "Poetry" research huge collection of books , too numerous to cite individually.
sentences.chinese: 歷代學者對《詩經》的研究可謂汗牛充棟，不勝枚舉。
